mapper.select: select * from (select num ,yomi ,NVL(word,'-') word from jwords where summary IS NOT NULL order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where ROWNUM = 1

select * from (select num ,word ,yomi ,UTL_MATCH.jaro_winkler_similarity(#{keyword},yomi) ja from jwords where (yomi like #{keyword}||'%' OR word like #{keyword}||'%') order by ja desc) where ROWNUM < 10

select * from (select num ,yomi ,word ,COALESCE(summary,meaning) summary ,type from jwords where ((summary IS NOT NULL) OR (word IS NOT NULL)) AND (type IS NOT NULL) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where ROWNUM < 11

select * from (select num ,yomi ,word ,COALESCE(summary,meaning) summary ,type from jwords where ((summary IS NOT NULL) OR (word IS NOT NULL)) AND jlpt = #{value} order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where ROWNUM < 11

select * from (select num ,yomi ,word ,COALESCE(summary,meaning) summary ,type from jwords where ((summary IS NOT NULL) OR (word IS NOT NULL)) AND star = #{value} AND (type IS NOT NULL) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where ROWNUM < 11

select * from (select jw.num ,jw.yomi ,jw.word ,COALESCE(jw.summary,jw.meaning) summary ,jw.type ,NVL(jv.remembered,TO_DATE('19000101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) REMD from jvoca jv, jwords jw where jv.vnum = jw.num AND ((jw.summary IS NOT NULL) OR (jw.word IS NOT NULL)) AND jv.owner = #{value} order by REMD asc) where ROWNUM < 11
mapper.update: update jvoca set remembered=SYSDATE where vnum = #{value}
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from jvoca where owner = #{value}

select * from (select rownum r, m.* from (select jv.vnum "num" ,jw.word "word" ,jw.yomi "yomi" ,jw.type "type" ,jw.summary "summary" ,jv.inserted "added" ,jv.remembered "remembered" ,jv.owner "user" from jvoca jv, jwords jw where jv.owner = #{user} AND jv.vnum = jw.num order by jv.inserted DESC) m) WHERE r >= #{startitem} AND r <= #{enditem}
mapper.update: merge into jvoca a using dual on (a.vnum = #{num} AND a.owner = #{user}) when matched then update set inserted = SYSDATE when not matched then insert ( vnum ,owner ) values ( #{num} ,#{user} )
update jvoca set remembered = SYSDATE where vnum = #{voca} AND owner = #{user}
mapper.select: select * from jusers order by username asc
